SEARCH
Package gw.api.contact

Class ContactSystemUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.contact.ContactAutoSyncUtilBase
gw.api.contact.ContactSystemUtil
public class ContactSystemUtil extends ContactAutoSyncUtilBase
Provides methods that operate on Contacts with the registered ContactSystemPlugin.

  • Method Details

    • autoSyncContact

      public static void autoSyncContact(String addressBookUID)
      If the local contacts are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the remote Address Book.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified

    • autoSyncContact

      public static void autoSyncContact(String addressBookUID, String newAddressBookUID)
      If the local contacts linked to the AddressBook Contact with an ABUID of addressBookUID are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the contact which has an ABUID of newAddressBookUID in the remote Address Book.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified
      newAddressBookUID - - the address book uid for the remote contact the local contact should sync to

    • autoSyncContact

      public static void autoSyncContact(String addressBookUID, Key minID, Key maxID, String newAddressBookUID)
      If the local contacts are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the remote Address Book.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified

    • createAutoSyncWorkItem

      public static void createAutoSyncWorkItem(String addressBookUID)
      Create an contact auto sync work item for this given addressBookUID. If the system config param "InstantaneousContactAutoSync" is set to true, then the ContactAutoSync worker is notified as well.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - Address book uid for the contacts need to re-sync

    • createAutoSyncWorkItem

      public static void createAutoSyncWorkItem(String addressBookUID, String newAddressBookUID)
      Create an contact auto sync work item for this given addressBookUID. If the system config param "InstantaneousContactAutoSync" is set to true, then the ContactAutoSync worker is notified as well. If a newAddressBookUID is specified, the addressBookUID of those contacts will be replaced by newAddressBookUID.

    • calculateAndSetContactFingerprint

      public static void calculateAndSetContactFingerprint(Contact contact)

    • clearContactFingerprint

      public static void clearContactFingerprint(Contact contact)

    • importContactFromContactSystem

      public static Contact importContactFromContactSystem(Bundle bundle, String abUIDOfContact, boolean syncRelatedContacts)
      Returns a persistable local copy corresponding to the specified contact in the Contact System, and optionally including the related contacts.
      Parameters:
      bundle - The bundle in which to place the new contact graph. If null it will use the default behavior.
      abUIDOfContact - AddressBookUID of the remote contact that needs to be imported.
      syncRelatedContacts - If true, all the related contacts (if any) of the contact will be pulled in as well, and will be attached to the local contact.
      Returns:
      the locally created contact, linked to the remote one.
      Throws:
      ContactSystemNotAvailableException - if the ContactSystem can't be contacted or it has not been configured
      ContactSystemContactNotFoundException - if the ABUID provided is not found in the ContactSystem
      ContactSystemPluginException - if no ContactSystemPlugin is defined

    • importContactFromContactSystem

      public static Contact importContactFromContactSystem(String abUIDOfContact, boolean syncRelatedContacts)
      Returns a persistable local copy corresponding to the specified contact in the Contact System, and optionally including the related contacts.
      Parameters:
      abUIDOfContact - AddressBookUID of the remote contact that needs to be imported.
      syncRelatedContacts - If true, all the related contacts (if any) of the contact will be pulled in as well, and will be attached to the local contact.
      Returns:
      the locally created contact, linked to the remote one.
      Throws:
      ContactSystemNotAvailableException - if the ContactSystem can't be contacted or it has not been configured
      ContactSystemContactNotFoundException - if the ABUID provided is not found in the ContactSystem
      ContactSystemPluginException - if no ContactSystemPlugin is defined

    • generateLinkStatus

      public ContactSystemLinkStatus generateLinkStatus(Contact localContact)
      Generate the link status for the given contact. This involves a round trip to the remote Contact System to fetch the current version of the linked Contact, then computing fingerprints on the remote (and possibly the local) Contact.

    • isSyncableRelationship

      public boolean isSyncableRelationship(ContactBidiRel bidiRel, IEntityType contactSubtype)
      returns if the given bidi rel is a primary syncable relationship for the given Contact subtype
      Returns:
      boolean true if the bidi rel is a primary syncable relationship

      Returns:
      the potential matches found

      Returns:
      result of the link operation
